title: Lost rp on a skin boost for an ARAM, but someone dropped out in champ select.
body: i had 133 rp after i had 38 but the game didn't even start how could it use my rp if the game did not even start?

replies.body: Guys a week with no response from support on either side. What is going on? This is not a joke now i want my rp it wasnt even about that but i am being ignored. I paid money and it was taken.
I was told to post to riot support about this, yet i have heard nothing about this it is really odd.
Still have not heard back from riot support after ticket submitted. This is second time this has happened to me and not going to let it get swept under the rug again.

We'd like to look into this to find out what's going on, and help out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this individually and look at all the details.  We'll respond asap!

Something needs to be looked at there is a glitch in the system when you click on the skin boost for your team. This happened a while back as well and i could not prove it, there has to be a way riot can look at my account and see i paid for a skin boost but no game. I can imagine how many times small amounts of rp are being lost to this glitch, Millions of people adds up.
